website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy slip-on with flexibility for indoor wear and trips outdoors.
pros: Thicker sole and more support than Finn style
Suede upper, wool lining and footbed, nylon binding, synthetic outsole
cons: Some say the sole is too hard for wear as a traditional house slipper

customer_reviews.title: Great style! Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 1.5 but I ordered the size 2 and they fit perfect. They mold to your feet. The perfect winter/ year round slipper to wear inside or even outside. The bottom of the slipper are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Madison W

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. Not a day goes by since buying these that my feet don’t slip into them at some point throughout the day. They’re comfy to stand & walk in for longer periods around the house. So glad I bought these as I’d been looking for quality slippers for a while now. Look no more!
customer_reviews.author: WildeS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I can't wait to get home and into my slippers. I am a fully grown adult with small feet and I am so happy Ugg makes kids slippers that don't look like kids slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Musubi

customer_reviews.title: Love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves these slippers. Bought them a size up so she could wear them a long time. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I am a size 5 in women’s so to save money I’ll buy a size 3 in kids. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Powell

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and they keep my feet warm during this freezing
customer_reviews.text: I wear them everyday. So comfortable and they keep my feet warm during this freezing winter
customer_reviews.author: AABW

customer_reviews.title: The perfect slipper for Kids and Adults
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get Ugg slippers at a reduced price. These are must have slippers in the winter ( or really any time) I can't wait to get them on when I come home from work. The larger girl's sizes equate to women's sizes, so just look up how they translate and buy the kid's slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Color is paler than depicted
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are good, as usual, but the color is paler and more muted than the picture suggested. I was hoping for the vibrant almost magenta color in the picture but they're kinda mildly hot pink.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: love having smaller feet
customer_reviews.text: this is a six i bought . should fit an 8 . it would not fit anyone who wears and 8. It does fit a size 7 womans and up to a wide foot much better than the ugg scuffett
customer_reviews.author: lowcountrymom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected for a UGG product, cozy feel & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lbell

customer_reviews.title: Affordable version of women’s
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a kids size because they are almost half the price of the women’s version. So glad I did! They are just as cute and I wear them every single day! I’m a 7-7.5 in women’s and the kids 6 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Bailes

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: The perfect slipper to lounge around the house in. I know some might think they are too expensive to be slippers but I believe that they are a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: C. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Kind of snug, but comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a size 7.5 in women’s but always get a 6 in Ugg kids size boots. This slipper fits PERFECT unlike the boots which give me more room. However, since it is a significant price difference and I will only really wear in the house, I will keep them. I will probably just get the women’s one next time so I can have more room. The slippers are very comfy though and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Newyorker4293

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a woman’s 8 these will fit! Love my Uggs!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much!!!!!! The only thing was the fur was a little messed up on the back of one slipper but im very anal about my new products. I’m keeping them and so happy with how they feel and fit. Love that they can be worn outside as well. Love uggs! I’m a 7.5-8 in women so the 6 in big kids was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: justin pinto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cozy! Love my ugg slippers! Fits as expected! This is my second pair of these slippers. I got the first in the tan color and the second pair in the pink and i absolutely LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: RAZ

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Slipper!
customer_reviews.text: As soon they arrived I put them on and didn't want to take them off. The slippers are so comfy and fit perfect. I wear a 6.5-7 in women's but the kids 6 fit great! And the prime shipping is great!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Elder

customer_reviews.title: ok slipper
customer_reviews.text: got the kids size 6 for my daughter who wears a womans size 7 1/2. they were way to big so exchanged them for a size 5 kids. its cheaper .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and so comfy. Came in perfect condition and just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: sara 🧚🏼‍♀️

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Ugg got it right with these!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 6 in uggs so I honestly could’ve purchased a 4 in the kids, but they are slippers so that’s okay that they have a bit of extra room! I LOVE these slippers, I’ve been wearing them constantly since they arrived. Super warm and comfy, they also can be worn inside and outside, great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: London  Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was very soft and comfortable. Runs true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Grace

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: These are not real UGGS. They are fine, but fake. The lining is a synthetic acrylic that’s glued onto a microfiber material for the outside fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: Reimburse me for Pennsylvania State tax. PA residents are exempt for clothing items.
customer_reviews.text: You charged me Pennsylvania State tax and Pennsylvania residents are not charged tax for clothing. Please reimburse my credit card. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Faluvegi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old for Christmas, she hasn't taken them off since opening them!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with these slippers. They are comfortable and warm. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and fit true to size. Very happy with the product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AnaMaria

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: They were a Christmas gift for my niece and she loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Brought this item for my granddaughter she just love them
customer_reviews.author: c owens

customer_reviews.title: great fit and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Xmas Gift. Was cheaper than DSW and arrived faster with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: paraskevi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got the largest size, and they fit me. I normally wear a womens size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Glady

customer_reviews.title: ... a size 5 in Ladies shoes so these fit perfect! Love them
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 5 in Ladies shoes so these fit perfect! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Feudo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers. Shame I can’t wear them everywhere. So comfy and warm. Size chart was correct.
customer_reviews.author: claireo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The UGG slippers arrived damaged in the box. I wear a size 7.5 women's. The kids size 6 fit perfect. I am upset the front of the UGG is damaged though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes but no
customer_reviews.text: To be cozy slippers they are extremely hard at the bottom not cozy at all. They are made to walk outside in the yard or somewhere besides the house. Looking for house slippers this will not work. They are extremely cute by the way
customer_reviews.author: Krysteina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ugg quality.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to get the kid size for my teenage daughter to save a little money. They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chappy

product_meta.title: UGG Kids' Cozy II Slipper
feature_bullets: Dyed Sheep, Fur Origin: United States/United Kingdom/Spain/Ireland/Australia
